CanvasRenderingContext2DSetTransform.summary: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.setTransform() method of the Canvas 2D API resets (overrides) the current transformation to the identity matrix, and then invokes a transformation described by the arguments of this method. This lets you scale, rotate, translate (move), and skew the context.

blockquote.para:
See also the method; instead of overriding the current transform matrix, it
multiplies it with a given one.
